column1: Randomizer feature is available. The construction like [Buy||Order||Purchase] will use a randomly picked word.
column2: Randomizer feature is available. The construction like [Buy||Order||Purchase] will use a randomly picked word.

column1: Also randomizers can be used within other template variables, ex: [-parameters:||-filters: {filter_all}]. Number of randomizers blocks is not limited within the template.
column2: Also randomizers can be used within other template variables, ex: [-parameters:||-filters: {filter_all}]. Number of randomizers blocks is not limited within the template.

It is used to change the H1 tag on product pages.
